data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of Neotropical Phyllocnistis Zeller, 1848 (Lepidoptera: Gracillariidae), with descriptions of seven new species and host plant associations

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brito, Rosângela, Lopez-Vaamonde, Carlos, Gonçalves, Gislene L., Becker, Vitor O., Mielke, Olaf H. H., Moreira, Gilson R. P. (2017): Taxonomic revision of Neotropical Phyllocnistis Zeller, 1848 (Lepidoptera: Gracillariidae), with descriptions of seven new species and host plant associations. Zootaxa 4341 (3): 301-352, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4341.3.1
